str2: In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Hades, the unseen world. Properly, unseen, i.e. 'Hades' or the place of departed souls.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To begin, am, exist, be in possession. From hupo and archomai; to begin under, i.e. Come into existence; expletively, to exist (verb).
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Torture, torment, examination by torture. Perhaps remotely from the same as basis; a touch-stone, i.e. torture.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To raise, lift up. From epi and airo; to raise up.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Properly, to stare at, i.e. to discern clearly; by extension, to attend to; by Hebraism, to experience; passively, to appear.
Abraham, progenitor of the Hebrew race. Of Hebrew origin; Abraham, the Hebrew patriarch.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.
From a (long) distance, afar. Adverb from makros; from a distance or afar.
Probably of Hebrew origin; Lazarus, the name of two Israelites.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Apparently a primary word; the bosom; by analogy, a bay.
